milestones.title: Delivered my 1st in-person talk
milestones.description: Delivered my first in-person talk on Docker and Docker Compose.

milestones.title: First repo to reach 1K stars
milestones.description: My DevOps journey and learnings was the first repo of mine to reach 1K stars on GitHub

milestones.title: Crossed 20K followers on Twitter
milestones.description: Creating content on Open Source and DevOps and connecting with people on Twitter helped me to cross the 20K followers milestone

milestones.title: Crossed 1K followers on GitHub
milestones.description: Building Open Source projects in public and collaborating with people on Pull Requests helped me to cross the 1K followers milestone

milestones.title: Became EddieHub Ambassador
milestones.description: Being an Ambassador for the EddieHub community, I take forward the value, vision, and mission of the EddieHub community, to help people get started with Open Source and provide them an inclusive space to learn, grow and collaborate.

milestones.title: Crossed 5K followers on LinkedIn
milestones.description: Creating content on Open Source and DevOps and connecting with people on Twitter helped me to cross the 5K followers milestone

milestones.title: Became Kubernetes and Kubernetes SIGs GitHub Org. member
milestones.description: Became Kubernetes and Kubernetes SIGs org member after actively contributing to projects on both orgs

milestones.title: Became Postman Student Leader
milestones.description: Leaders advocate for API literacy and host events to help developers learn about APIs

milestones.title: Won 1st international hackathon - daily.dev RSS feed Hackathon
milestones.description: Interestingly this was 1st hackathon daily.dev hosted and 1st time I participated. I build a Discord bot that uses an RSS feed to fetch the latest bookmarks of users from daily.dev. To see the project, click on the link

milestones.title: Became MLH Mentor
milestones.description: Mentors provide both technical and non-technical support to the hackers throughout the hackathon.

milestones.title: Become a DevRel
milestones.description: I want to become a Developer Advocate ü•ë for an Open Source company or projects which come under the CNCF ecosystem

milestones.title: Start video content on YouTube and get 1K subscribers by the end of 2023
milestones.description: I want to start video content on YouTube to help people get started with Open Source and DevOps

milestones.title: Speak and attend international conferences
milestones.description: I want to speak and attend international conferences to share my knowledge and learn from others
